Class FileStackSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.stack.sourcesink.server.StackServerBase

        • clearcontrol.stack.sourcesink.source.FileStackSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileStackInterface, FileStackSourceInterface, StackSourceInterface, StackSinkSourceInterface, java.lang.AutoCloseable

extends FileStackBase
implements FileStackInterface, FileStackSourceInterface, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileStackSource

        public FileStackSource(coremem.recycling.BasicRecycler<StackInterface,StackRequest> pStackRecycler)
        Instantiates a file stack sink given a root folder and dataset name. This delegates to the appropriate file stack sink by determining the format automatically.
        Parameters:
        pStackRecycler - stack recycler
